archimate:Assessment.name: Number of successful vs. unsuccessful crisis rehearsals over time
archimate:Assessment.documentation:
Tracks the count of crisis management tests that meet (successful) or do not meet (unsuccessful) the established success criteria across various testing periods, providing insights into the evolution and improvement of the organization's crisis management processes.
Jiri Paloch: What's most important is that the rehearsals take place. What is successful or not will vary a lot and challenging to capture.
